title: SELF-HYPNOSIS WITH A MIRROR / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS COURSE WITH DR. PARET
description:
The exercises with a mirror is used for self-hypnosis, as well as for developing a stronger gaze for Fascination. The person doing the exercises, has to stay in front of a mirror, looking at his eyes without blinking. After some moments, the person starts to enter in a deep trance. In this video you will also find information about Dr. Paret's upcoming course! Watch till the end. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school.
